name: Don't Look Back
description: Don't Look Back is a VR Horror, Puzzle solving game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 900 series Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1080 Storage: 4 GB available space
